doc:
Bellamy Young https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bellamy_Young 0 Bellamy Young (born Amy Maria Young; February 19, 1970) is an American actress and singer, best known for her role as President Melody "Mellie" Grant in the ABC drama series Scandal (2012–2018). In 2014, for her portrayal of Mellie, Young won the Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Supporting Actress in a Drama Series. Bellamy_Young ( born Amy_Maria_Young ; February_19_,_1970 ) is an_American_actress_and_singer , best_known for her_role as President_Melody_"_Mellie_"_Grant in the_ABC_drama_series_Scandal ( 2012 – 2018 ) . In 2014 , for her_portrayal of Mellie , Young won the_Critics '_Choice_Television_Award for Best Supporting_Actress in a_Drama_Series .
